content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's start the negotiation. What is your offer for the rental price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I am a student so I can offer 500 Euro per month. This is a fair price for the apartment, because it is unfurnished and in the city center.
[I acknowledge the offer, but I will start negotiating by making a higher offer.]

[I acknowledge the offer, but I will start negotiating by making a higher offer.]

[I will make an offer slightly higher than the initial offer to start negotiating.]

I see, 500 Euros is a reasonable offer. However, I feel that the apartment's prime location and modern construction justify a higher price. I'm offering 600 Euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: [I will counter the offer with a higher price.]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, but I have to consider my budget as a student. I can offer 550 Euro per month. This is a good price for the apartment considering its unfurnished state.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: [I will counter the offer with a higher price.]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandable, but considering the high demand for apartments in the city center and the quality of the construction, I believe 575 Euros per month would be a fair price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: [I will counter the offer with a higher price.]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a good offer, but as a student, I need to consider my budget. I can offer 570 Euro per month. I think this is a fair price for the apartment, considering its unfurnished state.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: [I will accept the offer as it meets my desired price.] I agree to the price of 570 Euros per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
